name: Summer Solstice Cerveza Crema
description: "This copper colored ale is smooth, malty, and lightly sweet, with a delicate hint of spice for that oh-so-drinkable, extra velvety flavor.  The character is lighter in body than its cousin our wildly popular Winter Solstice Seasonal Ale.  This is a silky, creamy dream, perfect as a warm weather beer."
